website_summaries.verdict: The Optoma S303 provides solid data image quality, portability, and a good set of connection ports for a budget data projector.

customer_reviews.title: bright, quiet and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Working for a church means you need to get a great piece of hardware with a minor price tag. This fit the bill perfectly. This device is used as a rear projector; this means the image must be crisp and visible over 100ft. away. The high powered 3,000 lumen bulb and HDMI ports allow for this distance and more. We haven't used it for any 3D projecting so do not know how well that works however.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: Use it at church for powerpoint. Works great, easy to set up and use. Good visibility even in bright light. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Frost

customer_reviews.title: Was purchased for use in the church and works great. No complaints what so ever
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased for use in the church and works great. No complaints what so ever. Would purchase again. Have been using for 3 years now. Great projector. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality and 3D image
customer_reviews.text: Love this and have been putting it to good use since I purchased item. Picture quality on my projector screen is just mind blowing when playing games or watching 3D movies. Have had others comment on the clarity and features that come with it. This replaced a LCD 50" TV that was hard on the eyes playing COD Ghosts and Black Ops II. Never had tears or strain on my eyes playing long rounds of zombies or extinction. Would highly recommend to anyone who doesn't own a DLP projector or knows the difference between the other OLED, LCD, or older models. World War Z is just mind blowing in 3D :P
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Perry

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is great. I get high def signal to it and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this project for more than 6 months now, it works very well. The picture quality is great. I get high def signal to it and it is not pixilated. Great buy for the price. It play 3d too which I had to buy separate glades for it.
customer_reviews.author: BabaJabs

customer_reviews.title: movies just look better on a BIG screen.
customer_reviews.text: This projector works great.It has a beautiful picture. .nice and bright..It is also very quiet. the 3d works wonderfully. .I use optoma ZD301 DLP 3D glasses.
customer_reviews.author: John Hall

customer_reviews.title: Project Your Message with Confidence!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, clear, and makes my presentations shine! Like the battery bunny, it just keeps going without a hitch! Love this little projector...my partner in business!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Conradi

customer_reviews.title: works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my church. It works great when the lights are off, even with the light from the windows coming in and at about 20' from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: peter paper

customer_reviews.title: Having a little trouble. Sometimes when you turn it ...
customer_reviews.text: Having a little trouble. Sometimes when you turn it on the screen is offset. example:blue is orange, and green is purple,
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great home/family projector
customer_reviews.text: Great picture! Use it to show outdoor movie to family and friends and it puts up a clear, bright, sharp picture that fills the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Vass

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: The projector is easy to hook up and has a clear picture. Lightweight and portable. Works well indoors and outside in a variety of lighting conditions.
customer_reviews.author: amanda kell

customer_reviews.title: ... more of computers rather than Tv the picture is great! Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Although this wasn't the projector I was looking for as it is meant for more of computers rather than Tv the picture is great! Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferSL

customer_reviews.title: This has a very good picture! We are currently using it with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This has a very good picture! We are currently using it with a 96 wide screen. It doesn't have great sound, but we just turn the sound off and use with one of those $30 bluetooth speakers and it works great. The sound is a bit quiet and also sounds muffled.
customer_reviews.author: Vickivail

customer_reviews.title: yep... its good
customer_reviews.text: nice picture, gets a little hot but they all do, slim and very pretty black color. very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: j rhea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I recommend it shipped on time thanks I love
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Ramon

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome! Can't think of a thing I would improve
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome! Can't think of a thing I would improve.
customer_reviews.author: John Mares

customer_reviews.title: WOW great projector
customer_reviews.text: simply put we love it, great projection and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Very easy plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quick delivery time to Canada, hassle free. As this was my second Optoma unit, was a very quick set up. Within the hour of unwrapping was able to watch a movie in my home theatre. Very happy with clarity of picture. Mounting on old unit ceiling mount caused some difficulty. Slight changes in mounting area on new unit. Has been 2 weeks and still happy with unit and price paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Rick D.

customer_reviews.title: works great in doors
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it outside yet...works great in doors. Expect even better outside. Instructions not the clearest, but when on and using renote, menu and options are very easy to go through.
customer_reviews.author: M. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Quick startup and easy use
customer_reviews.text: Everything about getting the projector started, hooked up to the computer, and functional was great--very intuitive. The only issue was that the connection cable to the computer was VGA, yet my new Dell no longer has that connectivity. I needed to get an HDMI cable to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Spector

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Home Theater!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! picture. Bright, crisp image. The 3d is amazing. Sometimes get a weird shake in the picture when first starting 3d. Turn off the projecter and turn it back on and it's fine. Not sure if it's the projecter or the blu ray player... This is used in my home theater and I couldn't be happier! Awesome for movies. I have owned several projectors in the past. This one being my favorite
customer_reviews.author: MarkR

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for the money. Could stand to be a little bit brighter, otherwise 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great resolution. I can use not only for business purposes, but for entertainment. Nice price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Renzo Toledo Z

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing about it is the volume. I connected it to several different speakers, including Bose, and the volume is very low. Could be just this projector, could be the model. I'm not sure. I replaced it with a Viewsonic and I'm happy with my new projector.
customer_reviews.author: candour

customer_reviews.title: Projector review
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the Optoma itselt- easy to use and good picture quality. Before purchasing the item, I read questions and answers on the Amazon site about this particular unit. One question was whether it came with a carrying case; the product expert replied that yes indeed, the projector would come with a carrying case. I was very disappointed that my projector did not come with any type of carrying case. I was also disappointed that it has no lens cap. It seems to me a $400 projector should have both.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent it works very and the picture is very clear
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Best Projector I purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best projector I have purchased. It is especially great for HD movies, and works well with my iPad for Keynote presentations. Worth the money IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Michling

customer_reviews.title: 😮
customer_reviews.text: Not what we wanted. Make sure you read it's functions carefully. Know what you don't want to get what you want.😐
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: 2nd projector from Optoma
customer_reviews.text: love it great value, exc..pic. easy setup ten times better projector than my last one. Will buy Optoma anytime anywhere got kids they will love it
customer_reviews.author: michael a williams

customer_reviews.title: Just ok projector!
customer_reviews.text: A little more fan noise than I expected/ somewhat distracting for a movie, and speaker quality is poor. Picture quality is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Ghizzoni

customer_reviews.title: traders
customer_reviews.text: AMAZON is being classified as a toppest trader among all where one can trust & respect ,also, providing best customer service . The function of Optoma-S303 is AMAZING . No other words I can describe .
customer_reviews.author: ragis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cover bulb
customer_reviews.text: This protection plan didn't cover a bulb which was the only reason I bought it. I returned it because I didn't see the value.
customer_reviews.author: D. Skrivan

customer_reviews.title: The brightness is fantastic, I have it in a showroom for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing simply rocks. The picture is very CRISP at 150" diagonal. It can do a much larger screen than that. The brightness is fantastic, I have it in a showroom for a home theater (remodeling company), and even with the full glass front door 7 feet to the right of the screen you can easily see the picture. Even in full room light the HD content is watchable though the blacks are hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up. Would have given a 5 star rating
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy set-up. Would have given a 5 star rating, but I'm still trying to figure out the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Optoma S303 SVGA 3000 Lumen Full 3D DLP Easy to Use Performance Projector with HDMI
product_meta.description:
The Optoma S303 projector generates a powerful, up to 3000 lumens bright image, combined with an industry leading 20,000:1 contrast ratio to bring out the finest details on your most important presentations or class lessons. HDMI connectivity for full digital compatibility as well as two VGA inputs, composite and S-video to satisfy your current and future needs. The S303 is incredibly easy to operate. Connect power and source, press the power ON button, and you will be presenting in no time.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


OPTOMA S303, SVGA, 3000 ANSI LUMENS, EASY-TO-USE PERFORMANCE PROJECTOR
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Optoma S303 projector generates a powerful, up to 3000 lumens bright image, combined with an industry leading 20,000:1 contrast ratio to bring out the finest details on your most important presentations or class lessons. HDMI connectivity for full digital compatibility as well as two VGA inputs, composite and S-video to satisfy your current and future needs. The S303 is incredibly easy to operate. Connect power and source, press the power ON button, and you will be presenting in no time.

AT A GLANCE:
 * Comprehensive connectivity to satisfy your current and future needs
 * 20,000:1 Contrast ratio helps deliver the most impactful presentations
 * Up to 10,000 hours of lamp life for minimal cost of operation
 * Full featured remote for maximum convenience
 * RS-232C port for remote operation and control



STATE-OF-THE-ART DLP TECHNOLOGY
Projectors with Texas Instrument's DLP with BrilliantColor technology feature multi-color processing to produce accurate and vibrant colors on the screen. The Optoma S303 multi-color processing system features a six-segment color wheel coated with an advanced material that achieves superb color saturation and accuracy for extraordinary image quality. In addition, incredibly high native contrast ratios ensure clean and crisp black and white to ensure that text and charts are easy to read.

GREEN BY DESIGN
The S303 has been designed and manufactured for eco-friendliness, to:

 * Use less than one-watt power consumption in standby mode - Up to 75 percent savings compared to regular standby mode
 * Limit energy use, with automatic shut down and remote management and control
 * Employ long-life materials and components
 * Use components that are lead-free on all printed circuit boards
 * Use no polystyrene foam in the packing materials
 * Comply with RoHS standards to phase out the use of hazardous materials

SPECIFICATIONS:
Display Technology Single 0.55" DC3 DMD DLP Technology by Texas Instruments Native Resolution SVGA (800 x 600) Brightness 3000 ANSI lumens Maximum Resolution UXGA (1600 x 1200) & 1080p (1920 x 1080) Lamp Life and Type 10,000/6500/6000/4500 Hours (Education cycle/ECO+/Dynamic/Bright) 190W Contrast Ratio 20,000:1 (full on/full off) Displayable Colors 1.07 Billion Projection Method Front, rear, ceiling mount, table top Keystone Correction ±40° Vertical Dimensions 12.4" x 4.6" x 8.8" Offset 115% Aspect Ratio 4:3 Native, 16:9 compatible Throw Ratio 1.97-2.17 Image Size (Diagonal) 30"-300" (0.7-7.62 m) Projection Lens F=2.51-2.69, f=21.95-24.18 mm, 1.1x manual zoom and focus Zoom 0.8 ~ 2.0 Noise Level 26dB Remote Control IR remote mouse control Operating Temperature 41-113°F (5-45°C), 85% max humidity Power Supply AC Input 100-240V, 50-60Hz, auto-switching Horizontal Scan Rate 15.375-91.146KHz Vertical Scan Rate 24-85Hz, 120Hz Memory 1.5 GB Onboard memory, microSD slot supports up to 32GB User Controls Complete on-screen menu, adjustments in 27 languages I/O Connectors HDMI v1.4a, two VGA-in, VGA-out, S-video, composite video, two audio-in, audio-out, RS-232C, USB-B Projection Distance 3.9'-32.8' (1.2-10 m) Image Size (Diagonal) 30"-300" (0.7-7.62 m) 3D Compatibility Supports all HDMI 1.4a mandatory 3D format, side-by-side format and top and bottom format Audio 2-Watt speaker Video Input Compatibility NTSC, PAL, SECAM, SDTV (480i), EDTV (480p), HDTV (720p, 1080i/p) Computer Compatibility UXGA, WXGA, SXGA+, SXGA, XGA, SVGA, VGA resized, VESA, PC and Macintosh compatible Weight 4.9 lb (2.21 kg) Security Kensington Lock Port, security bar and keypad lock Power Consumption Max 240W (Normal), Min 194W (Eco+), <0.5W (standby-ECO) WHICH OPTOMA PROJECTOR IS RIGHT FOR YOU?
Model S303 X303 W303 Brightness 3000 ANSI lumens 3000 ANSI lumens 3200 ANSI lumens Native Resolution SVGA (800 x 600) XGA (1024 x 768) WXGA (1280 x 800) Contrast Ratio 20,000:1 (full on/full off) 20,000:1 (full on/full off) 20,000:1 (full on/full off) Lamp Life and Type 10,000/6500/6000/4500 Hours (Education cycle/ECO+/Dynamic/Bright) 190W 10,000/6500/6000/4500 Hours (Education cycle/ECO+/Dynamic/Bright) 190W 10,000/6500/6000/4500 Hours (Education cycle/ECO+/Dynamic/Bright) 190W Projection Distance 3.9'-32.8' (1.2-10 m) 3.9'-32.8' (1.2-10 m) 3.9'-32.8' (1.2-10 m) Image Size (Diagonal) 30"-300" (0.7-7.62 m) 30"-300" (0.7-7.62 m) 30"-300" (0.7-7.62 m) Aspect Ratio 4:3 Native, 16:9 compatible 4:3 Native, 16:9 compatible 16:10 Native, 16:9 and 4:3 compatible Displayable Colors 1.07 Billion 1.07 Billion 1.07 Billion Display Technology Single 0.55" DC3 DMD DLP Technology by Texas Instruments Single 0.55" DC3 DMD DLP Technology by Texas Instruments Single 0.65" DC3 DMD DLP Technology by Texas Instruments I/O Connection Ports HDMI v1.4a, two VGA-in, VGA-out, S-video, composite video, two audio-in, audio-out, RS-232C, USB-B HDMI v1.4a, two VGA-in, VGA-out, S-video, composite video, two audio-in, audio-out, RS-232C, USB-B HDMI v1.4a, two VGA-in, VGA-out, S-video, composite video, two audio-in, audio-out, RS-232C, USB-B 3D Compatibility** Supports all HDMI 1.4a mandatory 3D format, side-by-side format and top and bottom format Supports all HDMI 1.4a mandatory 3D format, side-by-side format and top and bottom format Supports all HDMI 1.4a mandatory 3D format, side-by-side format and top and bottom format PROJECTION DISTANCE / IMAGE SIZE
Projection Distance Minimum Diagonal Maximum Diagonal 3.9'-32.8- (1.2-10 m) 30" 300" WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
The Optoma S303, SVGA, 3000 ANSI Lumens, Easy-to-Use Performance Projector, AC power cord, remote control, batteries for remote, lens cap, multilingual CD-ROM user's manual, quick start card, and warranty card.
